Comment: According to Project 2025 that is the plan.  >"Free Banking. In free banking, neither interest rates nor the supply of money is controlled by the government. The Federal Reserve is effectively abolished, and the Department of the Treasury largely limits itself to handling the government’s money. Regions of the U.S. actually had a similar system, known as the “Suffolk System,” from 1824 until the 1850s, and it minimized both inflation and economic disruption while allowing lending to flourish.23"

Comment: The Suffolk system was a simple note clearing device, not intended for insuring against any sort of liability or managing a large scale collapse .   Both the federal reserve and the fdic, and certain parts of the treasury and secret service, exist to secure the dollar and financial systems that everyone depends on
